meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hilly.
meanings.sent1: The hilliness of the landscape made it challenging to build roads.
meanings.sent2: The hilliness of the terrain provided a beautiful view from the top.
meanings.sent3: The hilliness of the backyard made it perfect for a fun sledding adventure.
meanings.sent4: The hilliness of the region resembled a giant wave frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The hilliness of the area was so extreme that it felt like a rollercoaster ride.

meanings.definition: The degree to which an area is characterized by hills.
meanings.sent1: The hilliness of the countryside made it ideal for hiking enthusiasts.
meanings.sent2: The hilliness of the neighborhood added charm to the houses nestled on slopes.
meanings.sent3: The hilliness of the park created a natural amphitheater for outdoor concerts.
meanings.sent4: The hilliness of the cityscape created a unique skyline against the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The hilliness of the land gave the impression of a giant sleeping under the earth.
